discussion.notes: Working a lot - getting it to work, setting up stuff, debugging. Still lots of progress to make. Security has to be kept in mind.

As discussed, evaluation will be split into three parts - Pre-activity survey, Interface, Post-activity survey. Usage of demographics may be unnecessary - put questions only if they can be justified. 30 questions max (aim for 20), 15 minutes survey. The priority is to evaluate USABILITY of app, however post-activity is to evaluate EFFECT of the app.

actions.item: Send instructions on committing to Ethics Checklist
